runs.comm: around the wicket, tossed up and pushed towards mid-on coming forwards
flat, coming in from outside off, drops back and cuts late towards point
flighted, skips forward and tries to launch one down the ground, nearly swings himself horizontla and gets a thick edge that loops between two fielders out towards point
pushed through, bit of spin outside off, left by Hales
on the stumps, stays back and glances one through the midwicket region
tossed up outside off, comes forward and punches a single to long-off
good length in the channel outside off, 82mph and chopped into the off side
sixer! Roy collars McClenaghan's second ball, marching out and smoking him high over long-on into the crowd
on the walk again, swings across the line and gets an inside edge through midwicket
over the wicket and pushed across the right-hander, who pushes forward at it
dug in short, slower-ball bouncer from Roy, who swats and misses
touch full and Roy belts another one out of the park, clean swing through the line and it flies back over the bowler's head
tossed up on middle and leg, Hales nurdles one off his front leg
pushed through outside off, another arm ball but this time Roy connects with a slash, one hand off the bat and it flies past backward point
full on the stumps, Roy sweeps hard and gets a top edge... but it's beyond Munro running back from square leg, just brushed the fingertips
on the stumps and worked into the leg side
tossed up and sweeps hard, doesn't get it through

pushed into the covers, Williamson swoops... and this is going to be tight. They took on the fielder but Roy comes out on the losing side, it bounced nicely for Williamson and he was a few inches short when Ronchi broke the bails. Disappointment for him, as he'd made a sparkling start
short and wide and cracked away through point, first boundary for Hales
pitched up, in the blockhole, 86mph and Hales digs it out
blocked short on the off side and they try to steal another one, Hales has to hit the afterburners to make his ground
bit of width, Root slashes a length ball towards cover point
tighter to off stump, shuffles out and drives, nicely timed to the left of mid-off and it went quickly to the fielder and they only get one
length ball, taking the pace off as Hales backed outside off stump, play and a miss... but Ronchi also misses it and they pinch a bye
darted in on the stumps, 62mph and Hales is hit on the pad sweeping, was outside the line
tossed up, gets down to this and sweeps through square to the sweeper for two
flighted outside off, comes forward and punches one down the ground
off-stump line, bit of dip and Root gets to the pitch, drives one more to long-off
tossed up, Hales makes room to the leg side and slots a firm drive past cover point for four
full on the stumps, Hales lines this one up and mows it high over deep backward square, long arms sweeping through the ball and sending it beyond the rope
shortish outside off, rolls the wrist and pulls a couple through midwicket
back of a length, slightly wide this time, Root sits back and throws his hands through a cut, gets it through point
dances down the pitch, hits through the line, smacked downtown for six more by Root! Big cheers as he comes out to greet Southee, scrambled seam and cracked back whence it came
ooh er, not quite, son... Root tries an adventurous reverse scoop and gets a toe-end into the off side
full on the stumps and clipped to midwicket
backs away, Southee follows him with a full ball, deflects off the pads
around the wicket, flat outside off, stands tall and punches to long-off
pushed through and driven down the ground off the back foot for one more
gives it a bit more air, still fizzing down at 61mph, clips a full toss through midwicket
flat trajectory outside off, Root drives off the back foot between long-off and deep extra cover for a couple
darted on middle stump, Root chops into the ground and Brendon McCullum gives chase from midwicket but can't prevent one
full on the stumps, Hales taps one more down the ground to long-on
slower ball, short of a length, Hales whips the hands through a pull to deep square leg
Root shuffles to leg, full and straight from Southee, following the batsman, dug out through midwicket
another slower ball, sitting up to be pulled from in front of the stumps, can't get any power on it and the sweeper cuts the ball off
full and wide, Root had moved across to premeditate a ramp to leg, instead he adjusted late and dabbed it late past short third man for four - amazing reflexes from the batsman
full on the stumps and nudged through the leg side
full toss on leg stump as Hales backed away, clumped through square

tossed up, Hales advances and the ball straightens as he slogs down the ground... loops high out towards mid-off where B-Mac takes it on the run! A scalp for Santner, who's bowled pretty well, Hales seeking bigger returns than were on offer from that investment
chopped through the covers for one
tossed up, Bairstow advances and plays with a straight bat down to long-off
full on the stumps, driven back to the bowler
slightly wider, stays back and cuts through cover point for a single into the deep

flighted, dipping and spinning - and bowled him, past the outside edge to shave the bails! The Beast of Chester-le-Street is slain, that was a beauty from Santner, Bairstow maybe a little stuck on the crease but it turned appreciably and was the perfect length flick the top of middle
short outside off, Root rocks back to cut, finds deep backward point
slower ball on leg stump, Morgan misses with a glance but picks up a leg bye behind square
banged in short, maybe a slower ball, Root mistimes a pull back to the bowler
length outside off, Root tries to hit the cover off it, can't get it through point
short again, pace on the ball and pace off the bat, scooped pull over midwicket and it races away to the fence
back of a length outside off, swings a cut in front of square, straight to the cover fielder
tad short and cut out past point into the deep
fuller ball and this is dug out down to long-on
outside leg, swept at and missed, Ronchi can't gather and it slips away for five wides
middle and off line, Morgan clips this down to long-on
around the wicket, leg stump line, this is steered out backward of square but only one available
full on middle and leg, clipped to deep midwicket
step down the wicket, meets this on the full and taps this to short midwicket
length ball around off, Morgan clears the front leg to smear this to long-off
outside off, Root shaped to paddle sweep leg side, then realised the ball wasn't there outside off and just left it alone
here gets outside leg to whack this wide of long-on, very well placed
goes for a reverse hit but gets it off the toe of the bat out to deep cover

down the track, clips this leg side, in the air out towards Taylor running in and takes the catch! Very well taken, miscue from Morgan, slightly cramped up and couldn't free his arms, this was nowhere near carrying for six and Taylor was running in off the deep square fence and held the chance well
length ball slapped out to deep cover
low full toss, this is swept wide of deep midwicket and they come haring back for the second
forward, just finds extra-cover this time
down to sweep this from middle and off straight to deep square this time
goes to reverse sweep, it turns down the leg side and Ronchi can't gather, no signal so we assume there was bat involved but it should have been byes, ho hum
down to sweep, mistimes this to short long leg, they run immediately and get home easily
full on off stump, this is clipped down to long-on
back of a length, this is pulled out to deep square
steps to leg to slap this down to long-on
goes across the stumps to paddle fine on the leg side, the man is back at long leg so it's just a single, Billings falls over in the process
full ball just outside off, this is carved out to deep point
run down the pitch looking to swing down the ground, gets a thick inside edge to long-on
slower ball just outside off, this is cut out to deep cover
steps to leg and pulls this is out wide of deep midwicket for a much-needed boundary, another fifty for Root he is on fire
short and pulled to the same rope, poor ball
this is fired in, aiming in the same area, Root mistimes it out to deep midwicket
down the track, gets inside the line to stroke this inside long-off, really nicely played, timed so well, just a clip but finds the rope
slightly short again BIllings quickly back to pull wide of long-on
down the track, meets this on the full and whacks this over long-on, nailed that
Root backs to leg, bowler follows him, Root adjusts and turns this out wide of deep square, lovely batting
length ball hammered out leg side, only on the bounce to deep midwicket
changes completely around for a switch hit, would have been a left-handed pull, totally miss
cramped up, manages to steer this out wide of deep midwicket and they sprint back for the second

runs down the wicket, McClenaghan bangs it in, Billings throws his hands at it and gets a top edge that flies high and is taken by the keeper! Easy catch in the end and the slower-ball bouncer has done the trick, important wicket with England just finding a little momentum
full delivery at the off stump, this is driven off side and mid-off is able to come to his left to field
around the wicket, low full toss on leg stump, this is cracked out but straight to deep midwicket
length ball sliding across Stokes who drives this firmly and wide of deep cover for a couple
slower ball, this is late cut to third man
slower ball swept out to long leg who fumbles and that encourages Root to charge back for the second and a direct hit might have seen him gone there
low full toss on leg stump, Root goes for the reverse paddle and lifts it over short long leg, outrageous shot, that was in fact played from well outside leg
down the track, takes a wild swing at a length ball and misses, nice slower ball from Southee, Root nicked it but it landed short of the keeper
length ball slapped out to deep midwicket
bumper on line but called too high

back of a length outside off, carved out on the off side but only to deep cover where the catch is taken after a moments hesitation. Stretching for it a little was Root and he couldn't control the stroke, finding the deep fielder
slower ball wide of off stump, slapped at and missed
slower ball again, this is dragged out to long-on
slower ball yet again, this is on off stump and just blocked in the crease
but not here, this is waited for back in the crease and heaves this over midwicket
slightly short of a length and this is pulled out hard from outside off through square leg, hammered away
yorker wide of off stump, this is slapped out to deep cover
slower ball outside off, heaved up over the leg side, it's gone up so high but Santner take the catch running in from long-on, a good take looking into the sun
yorker length but too wide of off stump
now a middle and leg line, this is whacked leg side, doesn't get all of it but squeezed it wide of short long leg
low full toss, driven out to deep cover
another low full toss, this on the stumps, clipped out wide of long-on and they come tearing back for the second
full outside off, this is driven very hard and gets past extra-cover
squarer this time and a fine diving save from Williamson at backward point going to his left
full around off stump, Rashid steps away to leg and drives, opening the face to squirt it fine of short long leg, nicely played
tries again to a ball more angled in, finds the fielder this time
bumper on a fourth-stump line, Stokes leaves it alone and it's deemed a legal delivery
another bouncer, this is pulled out hard and finds the midwicket fence
